page.title: 092ND SWINDERBY GIRL GUIDES.
page.content: The{Guides}meet at the Village Hall on Mondays at 6.30 until 8. There are 15 Guides, divided into 3 {Patrols called Swallow, Robin and Bullfinch. Their{uniform}is a blue top a navy blue hat & skirt and a yellow necker. They organise some of their patrol activities like plays, games,treasure hunts, outdoor cooking, camping and first aid courses. They also work towards various badges e.g.child care sportswoman and hostess. A new guide has to do 8 prepromise challenges. When she is enrolled she has to say this{promise:} I promise that I will do my best, To do my duty to God, To serve the Queen and help other people and To keep the Guide Law There are 4 {Trefoil badges,}yellow, green,red and Baden Powell. These are given to a Guide after she has passed certain tests.
